column1: The exception 4 to section 294 of the Penal Code reads as follows: -

column2: “Culpable  homicide  is  not  murder  if  it  is  committed  without
premeditation in a sudden fight in the heat of passion upon a
sudden quarrel and without the offender having taken undue
advantage or acted in a cruel or unusual manner.”
